name: Better Call Expert
description:
When you come home feeling exhausted after a long and bad day, what else can possibly go wrong? Well, worst scenerio is that your wife may have worse day than you had. And if she is on the way home, you dont have many options except listening to her.

In that limited amount of time, try to fix everything that is broken in your house. Or face the miserable horror of your wife. Choice is yours. Time is ticking!
